src:
SM Entertainment Ikat Kontrak dengan Agensi Beyonce di AS
05 Nov 2019, 20:03 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


SM Entertainment semakin mantap melangkah ke industri Amerika Serikat. (dok. SM Entertainment)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- SM Entertainment mengungkapkan telah jalin kerja sama dengan Creative Artist Agency (CAA) untuk mendukung aktifitas SuperM dan NCT 127. Lee Soo-man selaku produser dan Kim Young Min sebagai co-CEO SM Entertainment dikabarkan Variety resmi menandatangani kontrak dengan Creative Artist Agency (CAA) pada 17 Oktober untuk kegiatan SuperM dan NCT 127. "Sangat menyenangkan dapat bekerja bersama dengan agensi hiburan dan olahraga terbesar di Amerika Serikat," kata Lee Soo-man yang juga merupakan pendiri SM Entertainment. "Kami percaya bahwa SuperM dan NCT 127 akan jauh berkembang ke pasar global bersama CAA. Selanjutnya, kontrak ini hanyalah awal dari kolaborasi kami," lanjut Soo-man seraya mengungkapkan dirinya sebagai produser eksekutif akan berkontribusi aktif di dalam kolaborasi itu. Sebelumnya CAA sendiri telah membantu negosiasi untuk penampilan NCT 127 di Amerika Serikat, salah satunya dalam acara 'The Late Late Show with James Corden'. Selain itu mereka juga berperan dalam tur SuperM di Amerika Utara, yang bakal dimulai pada 11 November mendatang.


CAA selaku agen tak dipungkiri membantu kehadiran NCT 127 di program '

"Lee Soo-man dan timnya yang berbakat memiliki mata yang luar biasa untuk menemukan talenta dengan energi tinggi dan karisma. Kami merasa terhormat dan senang bisa bekerja dengan tim SM yang luar biasa untuk mendukung pertumbuhan dari apa yang sudah menjadi basis penggemar besar di seluruh dunia," ujar presiden CAA, Richard Lovett. Creative Artist Agency (CAA) merupakan agensi yang berbasis di Los Angeles, California. CAA memiliki lebih dari 3000 klien dan 299 staff. Beberapa artis internasional yang berada di bawah payung CAA adalah Beyonce, Ariana Grande, dan Mariah Carey. Ke depannya, CAA juga akan membantu SM Entertainment dalam bidang lainnya, termasuk brand gaya hidup, konser, produksi acara TV, iklan, layanan makanan, dan banyak lagi. (kir/rea)
text:
SM Entertainment Ties Contract with Beyonce Agency in the US
05 Nov 2019, 20:03 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


SM Entertainment is more determined to step into the United States industry. (doc. SM Entertainment)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - SM Entertainment revealed that it has collaborated with the Creative Artist Agency (CAA) to support SuperM and NCT 127 activities. Lee Soo-man as producer and Kim Young Min as co-CEO of SM Entertainment reportedly Variety officially signed a contract with Creative Artist Agency (CAA) on October 17 for SuperM and NCT 127. "It's great to be able to work together with the largest entertainment and sports agency in the United States," said Lee Soo-man who is also the founder of SM Entertainment. "We believe that SuperM and NCT 127 will greatly expand into the global market with CAA. Furthermore, this contract is only the beginning of our collaboration," continued Soo-man while expressing himself as an executive producer will contribute actively in the collaboration. Previously the CAA itself has helped negotiations for the appearance of NCT 127 in the United States, one of which was in the 'The Late Late Show with James Corden'. In addition they also played a role in the SuperM tour in North America, which will begin on 11 November.


CAA as an undeniable agent helped NCT 127's presence in the program '

"Lee Soo-man and his talented team have an extraordinary eye for finding talent with high energy and charisma. We are honored and happy to be working with an outstanding SM team to support the growth of what has become a large fan base around the world. , "Said CAA president Richard Lovett. Creative Artist Agency (CAA) is an agency based in Los Angeles, California. CAA has more than 3000 clients and 299 staff. Some international artists under the CAA umbrella are Beyonce, Ariana Grande, and Mariah Carey. Going forward, CAA will also assist SM Entertainment in other fields, including lifestyle brands, concerts, TV show production, advertisements, food services, and more. (kir / rea)
